titleStmt.title: An Inglish disputing of the fait hgoodes [sic], and their lawes the which I haue written according to the nevve inuention of the magnifyk and great doctour, and aduocat, Sir Philippe Glaum, &c. ... the third day of the moneth called Februarii, in the yeare of our Lorde a thousand, six hundred, three and twentie : thervp [sic] I will answer euen well in my English, with the grace and healp of the holy ghost [sic], by the shoole at H[e?]arbourn, at the seuen tenth day of the same moneth / Steuen George.
titleStmt.author: George, Steven.

publicationStmt.date: in the yeare of our Lord, 1623.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: broken type and print show-through, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
